mapper.select: select r.res_code ,r.res_title, r.res_date, r.rep_res, c.comm_ctx from resume r inner join comm c on r.res_tag1=c.sub_cat where r.user_id =#{mbid} and r.res_sts!='003' and c.main_cat='001' order by res_date desc
mapper.update: update S20210904.RESUME set res_sts=#{res_sts}, res_title=#{res_title}, rep_res=#{rep_res}, res_email=#{res_email}, res_img=#{res_img}, hs_name=#{hs_name}, hs_mjr=#{hs_mjr}, univ_name=#{univ_name}, univ_date=#{univ_date}, univ_mjr=#{univ_mjr}, cov_let=#{cov_let}, res_date=sysdate, res_tag1=#{res_tag1}, res_tag2=#{res_tag2}, res_tag3=#{res_tag3}, res_etc_link=#{res_etc_link} where user_id=#{user_id} and res_code=#{res_code}
